Items.deck: Shadow of Aten is an upcoming thriller game where you play as a ex British agent named Allan Scott as he investigates a murder of a famous British archaeologist in the year 1936.
Items.name: Shadow Of Aten

Items.deck: Genji tells the story of Yoshitsune and Benkei, who take on the forces of the Heishi to prevent them from acquiring mysterious crystals known as the Amahagane to fulfill their evil ambition.
Items.name: Genji: Dawn of the Samurai

Items.deck: Bunny Bricks as ridiculed in the Mega Fun Party 3 demo
Items.name: Bunny Bricks

Items.deck: The Dokodemo Issho franchise continues in this PlayStation 3 minigame collection.
Items.name: TORO! Let's Party!

Items.deck: Bloodwych is a classic Dungeon Crawler which features a split-screen two player mode in which each player controls a party of its own.

image.image_tags: All Images,Atari ST Box Art,Box Art

Items.name: Bloodwych

Items.deck: Ascend: Hand of Kul is a brutal action game from the creators of Toy Soldiers coming in 2013.
Items.name: Ascend: Hand of Kul

Items.name: Oji-san Tomete Iede Gal to no Win Win Sex Life

Items.deck: The second chapter in the epic Avadon trilogy.
Items.name: Avadon 2: The Corruption

Items.deck: Tiger Mission is a top down, vertical scrolling shooter for the Commodore 64.

Items.deck: A puzzle game from Gojira.

image.image_tags: All Images,Box Art,Inspector Gadget: Operation Madkactus

Items.name: Inspector Gadget: Operation Madkactus

Items.deck: Acting as a metaphor for addiction and escaping a hard reality through imagination, this depressing, though poignant game combines environmental manipulation and AI interaction to create a story-driven puzzle experience.
Items.name: Papo & Yo

Items.deck: Super Street Fighter II: Turbo Revival is a port of Super Street Fighter II: Turbo released for the Game Boy Advance.
Items.name: Super Street Fighter II: Turbo Revival

Items.deck: A fantasy-themed match-3 puzzle adventure game, similar to the Bejeweled series for Nintendo DS. An entry in the Jewel Link Chronicles series.
Items.name: Jewel Link Chronicles: Mountains of Madness

Items.deck: Astronomica: The Quest for the Edge of the Universe is a first person adventure game.
Items.name: Astronomica: The Quest for the Edge of the Universe

Items.deck: A sci-fi RPG set during the 'War of Water' on Mars.
Items.name: The Technomancer

Items.deck: Star Trek is a pinball machine based on the franchise of the same name, themed after the original television series.
Items.name: Star Trek

Items.deck: Wedding dash is the sequel to a serve-people type game.  Casual but energetic, try your best to keep your guests and couple happy.
Items.name: Wedding Dash 2

Items.deck: Amiga CD two-pack
Items.name: Superfrog/Arcade Pool

Items.deck: The latest installment of Sport Interactive's long-running football management franchise.
Items.name: Football Manager 2012

Items.deck: International Moto X is an off-road motorcycle racing game for the PS1 released in PAL regions.
Items.name: International Moto X

Items.deck: The first game in a series of horse-raising and racing simulation games from Hect.
Items.name: Thoroughbred Breeder

Items.deck: A strategic card game from Mexican developer Arrayansoft.
Items.name: Maliya

Items.deck: A spaceship builder roguelike developed by Pixelsaurus Games. The game is a officially-licensed re-imagining of Captain Forever.
Items.name: Captain Forever Remix

Items.deck: Known by a contemporary audience for its unfortunate title, Nuts & Milk is also the very first third-party game released on any Nintendo console.  It was released by Hudson Soft for the Famicom in 1984.
Items.name: Nuts & Milk

Items.deck: A remake of "Sinistar" the classic 80's arcade game. In this game the player is sucked through a wormhole and thrown into the universe of the Sinistar. Players must navigate 24 levels  in order to beat the game, and destroy gates and sinistars while they are at it.
Items.name: Sinistar Unleashed

Items.deck: Sports Collection compiles five previously released Game Boy sports games onto one cartridge.
Items.name: Sports Collection
